location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Secretary in the Secret, Political and Foreign Department, Fort William, Calcutta

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered slight pest damage, which has resulted in a small hole in f. 52 that has obscured some of the text.

mods.abstract: The letter regards a dispute between the Resident and Merza Zakee. It notes that the latter has refused the Resident's gifts in the belief they are insufficient for his services in honouring the Resident on behalf of Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā the Prince at Sheraz [Shiraz].
